author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police have registered a case against N. Arun, B. Pradeep, S. Thirumurthy, and S. Vignesh – all from K. Goundampalayam village – on charges of harassing a 12-year-old girl.

The police said that the four who went to a grocery shop in Sree Bharathi Nagar on Friday last, pulled the girl’s hand and teased her.

When the girl’s father, and his friend questioned their behaviour, a wordy duel broke out between them.

On Sunday, the four persons returned to the shop and assaulted the girl’s father and his friend.
title: Minor girl harassed
